item.description:
A Beatles Tribute Show
with dancing and a cash bar....

Enjoy Beatle's Music all night long with a Live Band "HELP"
Doors open at 7:00
Show starts at 8:00
Tickets are $20/person
YOU MUST CALL BY SUNDAY EVENING. Call Now at 978-640-0033 - EX 15 (General Manager) to purchase your tickets! They are almost sold out as of today, 4/17.
Tell them you are with the Merrimack Valley Singles Group!
Please reply yes ONLY if you plan to attend and purchase your ticket by Sunday. If you are shut out post a message. If more than 20 people want to come before the deadline I will call and see if they can still give us a third table.
Sounds like a fun evening!
item.how_to_find_us: I have reserved 2 tables for 20 folks in our group.
item.why: Nice location and a fun time with good people!

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: A Beatles Tribute Show and Dancing
